title: Bob Woodward booed at MeToo book event for “constantly interrupting female authors”
text:
In a Twitter thread, he added: ‘While @realBobWoodward is undoubtedly an expert on how one builds an investigative story, he could not have been more ill equipped for this particular conversation about #metoo.

‘His questions and interjections made clear he doesn’t understand the first thing about rape culture.’

According to Swirling, Twohey and Kantor repeatedly told the journalist that they believed Weinstein’s assaults were about ‘power,’ but he didn’t seem satisfied by their answers, and quipped, ‘So it’s about power? It’s about sex also though, isn’t it?’, to which the audience reportedly booed.
